doc:
Roger Moore https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Roger_Moore 0 Sir Roger George Moore (14 October 1927 – 23 May 2017) was an English actor. He is best known for having played Ian Fleming's fictional British secret agent James Bond in seven feature films from 1973 to 1985. Moore took over the role of Bond from Sean Connery in 1972, made his first appearance as 007 in Live and Let Die (1973), and went on to portray the spy in six more films until his retirement from the role in 1985. Appointed a UNICEF Goodwill Ambassador in 1991, Moore was knighted by Queen Elizabeth II in 2003 for services to charity. In 2007, he received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for his work in television and in film. In 2008, the French government appointed Moore a Commander of the Ordre des Arts et des Lettres. Sir_Roger_George_Moore ( 14_October_1927 – 23_May_2017 ) was an_English_actor . He is_best_known for having_played Ian_Fleming 's_fictional_British_secret_agent_James_Bond in seven_feature_films from 1973 to 1985 . Moore took over the_role of Bond from Sean_Connery in 1972 , made his_first_appearance as 007 in Live and Let_Die (_1973_) , and went on to_portray the_spy in six_more_films until his_retirement from the_role in 1985 . Appointed a_UNICEF_Goodwill_Ambassador in 1991 , Moore was_knighted by Queen_Elizabeth_II in 2003 for services to charity . In 2007 , he received a_star on the_Hollywood_Walk of Fame for his_work in television and in film . In 2008 , the_French_government appointed Moore a_Commander of the_Ordre_des_Arts_et_des_Lettres .
